Parameters

make_dir(dirname)

make_freqs(Nsamples, deltaF)

Function that makes an array of frequencies given the sampling rate and the segment duration specified in the initial parameter file.

omega_to_power(omega_GWB, frequencies)

Function that computes the GW power spectrum starting from the omega_GWB spectrum.

read_jobfiles(njobs, directory, segment_duration)

Method that reads in the job files to extract quantities such as the point estimate and sigmas.

slice_time_series(timeseries, istart, iend)

calculate window factors for a hann window
